# BlendTreeNode

**Protocol**

An interface for a node that’s a member of a blend tree.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol BlendTreeNode
```

## Overview

This protocol specifies the common functionality for the animations that compose a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeAnimation]. The animation defines a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeAnimation/root] node of this type. To define the tree, you assign the root node one of the follow structures that adopt this protocol:

- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode], which branches the tree for every element in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode/sources].
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode], which defines an animation to blend with its [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode/source] property.



Each node type supplies a name and weight, which you can set during or after initialization.

```swift
let animation1 = FromToByAnimation(...)

let blendNode = BlendTreeSourceNode(
    source: animation1,
    name: "Anim1",
    weight: .value(0.25))
```

## Configuring the blend tree node

- **name**: A textual name for the blend node.
- **weight**: A normalized percentage that designates how much effect this node has relative to peer nodes.

## Blending animations

- **blend(sources:name:isAdditive:)**: Combines the animations that result from the individual blend-tree nodes of the given array to a single blend-tree node.
- **blend(_:_:name:isAdditive:)**: Combines the animations that result from two blend-tree nodes into a single blend-tree node.

## Blend trees

- **BlendTreeAnimation**: A collection of animations on the same property that the framework blends to a single animation.
- **BlendTreeBlendNode**: A source node for an animation that mixes several animations to form a single animation.
- **BlendTreeSourceNode**: A blend node that contains an animation.
- **BlendTreeInvalidNode**: A blend tree node that’s internal only or sources from an invalid definition.
- **BlendWeight**: A numerical representation of the impact an animation has on a scene or entity.

## Conforming Types

- BlendTreeBlendNode
- BlendTreeInvalidNode
- BlendTreeSourceNode
